Verses: 1 nammudaiya Belanaagiya Dhevanaik Gembeeramaaip Paadi, Yaakkobin Dhevanaikkuriththu Aarppariyungal.
2 thamburu Vaasiththu, Veenaiyaiyum Iniya Osaiyaana Suramandalaththaiyum Eduththu, Sangeedham Paadungal.
3 maadhappirappilum, Niyamiththakaalaththilum, Nammudaiya Pandigainaatkalilum, Ekkaalam Oodhungal.
4 idhu Isravelukkup Piramaanamum, Yaakkobin Dhevan Vidhiththa Niyaayamumaayirukkiradhu.
5 naam Ariyaadha Paashaiyaik Ketta Egipthudhesaththaivittup Purappadugaiyil, Idhai Yoseppile Saatchiyaaga Erpaduththinaar.
6 avan Tholaich Sumaikku Vilakkinen; Avan Kaigal Koodaikku Neengalaakkappattadhu.

7 nerukkaththile Nee Kooppittaai, Naan Unnaith Thappuviththen; Idimuzhakkam Undaagum Maraividaththilirundhu Unakku Uththaravu Arulinen; Meripaavin Thanneergalidaththil Unnaich Sodhiththu Arindhen. (selaa.)
8 en Janame Kel, Unakkuch Saatchiyittuch Solluven; Isravele, Nee Enakkuch Sevikoduththaal Nalamaayirukkum.
9 unakkul Veru Dhevan Undaayirukkavendaam; Anniya Dhevanai Nee Namaskarikkavum Vendaam.
10 unnai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naane; Un Vaayai Virivaaith Thira, Naan Adhai Nirappuven.
11 en Janamo En Saththaththukkuch Sevikodukkavillai; Isravel Ennai Virumbavillai.
12 aagaiyaal Avargalai Avargal Irudhayaththin Kadinaththirku Vittuvitten; Thangal Yosanaigalinpadiye Nadandhaargal.
13 aa, En Janam Enakkuch Sevikoduththu, Isravel En Vazhigalil Nadandhaal Nalamaayirukkum!
14 naan Seekkiraththil Avargal Edhiraaligalaith Thaazhththi, En Kaiyai Avargal Saththurukkalukku Virodhamaagath Thiruppuven.
15 appozhudhu Karththaraip Pagaikkiravargal Avarukku Ichchagam Pesi Adanguvaargal; Avargaludaiya Kaalam Endrendraikkum Irukkum.
16 uchchidhamaana Godhumaiyinaal Avargalaip Poshippaar; Kanmalaiyin Theninaal Unnaith Thirupthiyaakkuven.
